agent.name: Account Intel
agent.description: Comprehensive account intelligence with meeting prep, relationship maps, competitive intel, and news alerts. Works across Salesforce, D365, and external sources.
agent.author: Copilot Entra Agent Team

metadata.name: AccountIntel
metadata.description: Get comprehensive account intelligence including company overview, relationship history, opportunities, risks, news, and AI-generated meeting preparation briefs.

account_name.description: Name of the account to research

actions.name: full_brief
actions.description: Complete account overview with all key data

example.output: Global Mfg: $4.2B revenue, customer since 2019, $1.2M ARR, health 72/100. 2 active opps ($3.29M). Renewal: March 2025.
Prep: Lead with Phase 1 ROI (23% efficiency gain). Avoid Siemens topic. Open items: ROI calculator, plant visit. Push 3-year renewal bundle.
Champion: Demo VP (VP Ops). Economic buyer: Demo Director (Low engagement - risk!). Gap: No CFO relationship for $2.4M deal.
Signals: 500M smart factory investment announced, new CDO appointed, Q3 beat + expansion. Hiring 3 automation engineers.
Siemens in 3 plants (35% share). ABB evaluating. Win themes: unified platform, Munich support team, switching cost leverage.
Expansion potential: $1.29M ARR. Priority: 1) Predictive Maintenance ($340K, 75% prob) 2) Cybersecurity ($150K, NIS2 driver).

useCases: Real-time news and buying signal alerts
description: Comprehensive account intelligence with meeting prep, relationship maps, competitive intel, and news alerts
trigger_phrases: Prepare me for my meeting with Global Manufacturing Corp
prepare me for my meeting with

conversation_flow.user_message: Prepare me for my meeting with Global Manufacturing Corp
conversation_flow.agent_response:
**Meeting Prep Brief: Global Manufacturing Corp**

**Executive Summary:**
Strategic account with $1.2M ARR and strong growth potential. Focus on $2.4M Plant Modernization opportunity and March 2025 contract renewal.

---

**Conversation Starters:**
- "Congratulations on the Automotive Excellence Award - how is the EV components expansion going?"
- "I saw Thomas posted about Industry 4.0 challenges - we have solutions there"
- "Your Q3 earnings mentioned capacity expansion - perfect timing"

---

**Key Talking Points:**

| Topic | Our Position | Proof Points |
|-------|--------------|-------------|
| Plant Modernization ROI | Phase 1 delivered 23% efficiency | Similar plant: 18-month payback |
| Contract Renewal | Propose 3-year with expanded scope | Lock pricing before Q2 increase |

---

**Landmines to Avoid:**
- Don't mention Siemens - lost deal still sensitive
- Acknowledge invoicing issues if Thomas raises it
- Avoid Shanghai plant discussion - regulatory issues

---

**Open Items from Last Meeting:**
- Send ROI calculator
- Schedule plant visit
- Case studies from automotive sector
- SAP integration timeline (Thomas asked twice)

---

**AI Recommendation:** Lead with Phase 1 success metrics and Anna's endorsement. Position Phase 2 + renewal as package deal. Have SAP timeline ready.

conversation_flow.user_message: Show me the relationship map for this account
conversation_flow.agent_response:
**Relationship Map: Global Manufacturing Corp**

---

**Decision Making Unit:**

| Role | Person | Influence | Sentiment | Engagement |
|------|--------|-----------|-----------|------------|
| Economic Buyer | Demo Director, Procurement Director | HIGH | Neutral | **LOW - RISK** |
| Technical Buyer | Heinrich Mueller, CTO | Very High | Positive | Medium |
| Champion | Demo VP, VP Operations | High | Very Positive | High |
| End Users | 45 users across Ops, Maintenance, Energy | - | 4.2/5.0 | Complete |

---

**Relationship Gaps:**
- No relationship with CFO (Demo CFO) - needed for large deals
- IT Director (Maria Hoffmann) is new - not yet engaged  
- Board level relationships missing

---

**Your Team:**
- Marc Dubois - Account Executive (3 years with account)
- Demo Rep - Solution Architect (Industrial Automation)
- Robert Chen - Customer Success Manager

---

**AI Recommendation:**
> **Multi-thread urgently.** Economic buyer Thomas is at risk - low engagement despite high influence. Ask Anna to facilitate introduction to CFO for the $2.4M deal.

ðŸ”§ Agent: AccountIntel.relationship_map

conversation_flow.user_message: What recent news should I know about?
conversation_flow.agent_response:
**News & Signals: Global Manufacturing Corp**
*Last 30 Days*

---

**HIGH RELEVANCE:**

**Dec 10** - "Global Manufacturing Announces 500M Smart Factory Initiative"
- Source: Reuters
- Opportunity: Major expansion budget - align proposals to this initiative
- **Action:** Reference in next meeting, position as enabling partner

**Dec 5** - "New Chief Digital Officer Appointed"
- Source: Company Press Release
- Opportunity: New executive relationship to build
- **Action:** Research CDO background, request intro via Heinrich

**Nov 15** - "Q3 Earnings Beat, Capacity Expansion Announced"
- Source: Financial Times
- Opportunity: Budget availability confirmed
- **Action:** Update opportunity values, accelerate proposals

---

**MEDIUM RELEVANCE:**

**Nov 28** - "Wins Automotive Industry Excellence Award"
- Use as conversation starter with Anna

---

**Social Signals:**
- Heinrich Mueller shared article on Industrial IoT trends (LinkedIn)
- Demo Director posted about supply chain digitization challenges (LinkedIn)

**Hiring Signals:**
- 3 open roles for Automation Engineers - expansion indicator
- Hiring Energy Manager - aligns with our opportunity

---

**AI Summary:** Strong buying signals: 500M investment + Q3 expansion + active hiring. New CDO is wildcard - prioritize relationship. Account is primed for larger strategic conversation.
